## Overview

Git jargon: https://help.github.com/articles/github-glossary/

Basics steps:

  - __clone__: copy the remote code repository locally
  
  - __pull__: fetch and merge remote changes
  
  - __commit__: "save" and document your modifications locally
  
  - __push__: "export" your modifications to the remote repository
